name: Christmas Horror (itch) (Piesuprawny)
description:
You are send to Canadian village by your boss. Your job was to check weird incidents happening in that village but on your way you meet some old guy who tells you the truth about Yellowknife. Michal terrorizes the village, he kidnaps people and he steals bricks. Your duty is to collect all the stollen brick and bring peace to Yellowknife!

-

-

-

Christmas Horror is a singleplayer horror game in which you have to collect items in order to win.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Flashlight: F

Throw Snowballs: G

Interact/Collect: E
